verses.verse: "Come,<WH1980> let us return<WH7725> to the Lord.<WH3068> For He has torn<WH2963> [us,] but He will heal<WH7495> us; He has wounded<WH5221> [us,] but He will bandage<WH2280> us.
"He will revive<WH2421> us after<WH4480> two days;<WH3117> He will raise<WH6965> us up on the third<WH7992> day<WH3117> That we may live<WH2421> before<WH6440> Him.

"So let us know,<WH3045> let us press<WH7291> on to know<WH3045> the Lord.<WH3068> His going<WH4161> forth<WH4161> is as certain<WH3559> as the dawn;<WH7837> And He will come<WH935> to us like the rain,<WH1653> Like the spring<WH4456> rain<WH4456> watering<WH3384> the earth.<WH776>"

What<WH4100> shall I do<WH6213> with you, O Ephraim<WH669>? What<WH4100> shall I do<WH6213> with you, O Judah<WH3063>? For your loyalty<WH2617> is like a morning<WH1242> cloud,<WH6051> And like the dew<WH2919> which goes<WH1980> away early.<WH7925>

Therefore<WH5921> <WH3651> I have hewn<WH2672> [them] in pieces<WH2672> by the prophets;<WH5030> I have slain<WH2026> them by the words<WH561> of My mouth;<WH6310> And the judgments<WH4941> on you are [like] the light<WH216> that goes<WH3318> forth.<WH3318>
For I delight<WH2654> in loyalty<WH2617> rather<WH3808> than<WH3808> sacrifice,<WH2077> And in the knowledge<WH1847> of God<WH430> rather<WH4480> than<WH4480> burnt<WH5930> offerings.<WH5930>
But like Adam<WH121> they have transgressed<WH5674> the covenant;<WH1285> There<WH8033> they have dealt<WH898> treacherously<WH898> against Me.
Gilead<WH1568> is a city<WH7151> of wrongdoers,<WH205> Tracked<WH6121> with bloody<WH1818> [footprints.]

And as raiders<WH1416> wait<WH2442> for a man,<WH376> [So] a band<WH2267> of priests<WH3548> murder<WH7523> on the way<WH1870> to Shechem;<WH7927> Surely<WH3588> they have committed<WH6213> crime.<WH2154>
In the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> I have seen<WH7200> a horrible<WH9624> thing;<WH9624> Ephraim's harlotry<WH2184> is there,<WH8033> Israel<WH3478> has defiled<WH2930> itself.
Also,<WH1571> O Judah,<WH3063> there is a harvest<WH7105> appointed for you, When I restore<WH7725> the fortunes<WH7622> of My people.<WH5971>
